description:
The National Crime Prevention CouncilGu00c7u00d6s mission is to be the nation's leader in helping people keep themselves, their families, and their communities safe from crime. To achieve this, NCPC produces tools that communities can use to learn crime prevention strategies, engage community members, and coordinate with local agencies.

name: NATIONAL CRIME PREVENTION COUNCIL, INC.
